title: Doctor's Portal
author: md shaiful ahasan
description: A doctor's appointment is a scheduled meeting with a medical professional for the purpose of diagnosing and treating health problems. During an appointment, a doctor will take a medical history, perform a physical examination, and may order tests to help with a diagnosis. It's important to arrive prepared with questions and to communicate any symptoms and concerns. Regular doctor appointments can help maintain good health and catch any potential issues early.
overview: There are two types of user login systems, using email/password and using a google account with Firebase Authentication system.
There is a dashboard section, based on the normal user & admin role.
A normal user can book doctor's appoointment, manage his bookings and post a review.
An admin can manage all bookings, add or remove a Bookings.
Admin can make a new admin by providing an email address.
user can make payment using stripe

title: arrowai repaintal website
author: md shaiful ahasan
description: Repainting is the process of applying a fresh coat of paint to a surface to enhance its appearance and protect it from damage. It's an easy and cost-effective way to give a room or object a new look. The key to successful repainting is proper preparation and application techniques.
overview: There are two types of user login systems, using email/password and using a google/github/facebook account with Firebase Authentication system.
There is a dashboard section, based on the normal user & admin role.
A normal user can place an order, manage his orders and post a review.
An admin can manage all orders, add or remove a product.
Admin can make a new admin by providing an email address.

title: Car Dealer website
author: md shaiful ahasan
description: Car online shopping refers to the process of purchasing a vehicle through an online platform, such as a dealership's website or a car-selling marketplace. This allows consumers to browse and compare cars from the comfort of their own home, without the pressure of a salesperson. Online shopping also provides a convenient and efficient way to research specifications, compare prices, and complete transactions. However, it's important to carefully read the details and fine print before making a purchase, and to thoroughly research the seller's reputation.
overview: There are two types of user login systems, using email/password and using a google/github/facebook account with Firebase Authentication system.
Car Dealer Warehouse Management System
A normal user can place an order, manage his orders and post a review.
An admin can manage all orders, add or remove a product.

title: netflix clone
author: md shaiful ahasan
description: Netflix is a popular streaming service that offers an extensive library of movies, TV shows, documentaries, and more. It allows users to watch content on their TV
overview: Netflix home page design
TMBD API with dynamic movies
dynamic slider

title: Mobile app
author: md shaiful ahasan
description: A mobile app is a software application designed to run on a mobile device, such as a smartphone or tablet. Mobile apps can be downloaded from app stores, such as the Apple App Store or Google Play Store, and can perform a variety of tasks, including games, social media, banking, shopping, and more. Mobile apps offer users convenience and quick access to information and services on-the-go. Developers are constantly creating new and innovative apps to meet the increasing demand for mobile technology.
overview: Landing page with 100% responsive
css animations
eye-catching design
